description:
Yue notices something during her test and wants to warn Shea about it, but Yue`s phrasing triggers Shea`s outrage.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Cheat Kyuuketsuki to Bug Usagi no Oogenka
La dispute de la surpuissante lapine et l`invincible vampire
La poderosa princesa vampiro y la gran batalla del conejo divino
The Overpowered Vampire Princess and the Godlike Rabbit`s Grand Battle
チート吸血姫とバグウサギの大喧嘩
